description:
Right now the XML pretty-printed in the API Sample tests has lines that are 1500 characters long.

This makes them difficult to review and even harder to resolve conflicts against if (heaven forbid) you're holding a patch against it.

Long term it would be nice to make these 'expected-value' declarations more extensible.

In the mean time, just having one-attr per line would make it easier to review and make conflicts much easier to resolve.
title: Make XML in API Samples Test Easier to Work With
